title: TVS Motors launches TVS HLX 150F with new features to mark best-selling model's milestone sales
description: TVS Motor Company has announced that its HLX two-wheeler line has sold 3.5 million units in international markets, reaching 3.5 million units. To celebrate, the company is launching the TVS HLX 150F, featuring added safety features, improved suspension, and improved styling. The model is now available in 50 countries across Latin America, Africa, and Asia.
